Scroll down to see what the background is doing, and some short summaries on my projects.
This Portfolio
This website was created using the Threejs javascript library to render the background geometry, and a grid-block content card structure.

Github Repository
Relational Database
This project was done for the databases course at CSUF, it features a MySQL relational database and a simple PHP front end for queries. I designed this database from the ground up from a requirements list, and then implemented it and it's front end on CSUF's local servers.

Github Repository
React Recipe App
This site was made for the group software development class at CSUF. It features a reactive React based front end and connects to the Spoonacular recipe and food API to search for recipes. The recipes can be saved locally in the browser, and viewed using the same content tile structure.

Github Repository
Thank you for having a look!
